LABEL: 0x2FF
STRING: The steam room...

LABEL: 0x319
STRING: I took a good look around the area after she identified where we were.

LABEL: 0x34F
STRING: Thick pipes were running in every direction.

LABEL: 0x373
STRING: Call me old-fashioned, but grandiose structures and power plants always felt romantic to me.

LABEL: 0x3E7
STRING: Maybe it was because of the steampunk book I had read when I was younger.

LABEL: 0x445
STRING: Excitement and awe welled up inside me.

LABEL: 0x469
STRING: I felt like a biologist visiting a submarine.

LABEL: 0x497
STRING: No, in terms of roles, wouldn't I be the Canadian...?

LABEL: 0x4D6
STRING: 「Hmph.」

LABEL: 0x4F3
STRING: Reiri snorted.

LABEL: 0x57D
STRING: 「This is an old-fashioned heating system... That's a national institute for you, never throwing things away.」

LABEL: 0x5C5
STRING: 「Then again――」

LABEL: 0x5E3
STRING: 「This is the result when you try to provide adequate heating for a huge ship like this.」

LABEL: 0x650
STRING: As she spoke, Reiri went to touch a nearby pipe with her right hand.

LABEL: 0x68C
STRING: She put her bare hand on the pipe――

LABEL: 0x6B2
STRING: I immediately grabbed her wrist.

LABEL: 0x6DC
STRING: 「Are you stupid?!」

LABEL: 0x6FC
STRING: I couldn't help but shout.

LABEL: 0x71C
STRING: Her body twitched in surprise at my voice, and she turned around to face me.

LABEL: 0x7E0
STRING: 「What's with the hand?」

LABEL: 0x807
STRING: 「It's hot! What do you think you're doing?!」

LABEL: 0x867
STRING: She kept her mouth shut and looked at me again with moist eyes.

LABEL: 0x8B1
STRING: 「W-What?」

LABEL: 0x8DE
STRING: 「...If you're that worried, try touching it yourself.」

LABEL: 0x91B
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x94B
STRING: At her urging, I timidly reached out with my hand that wasn't holding her wrist.

LABEL: 0x9A5
STRING: Slowly, I touched the pipe with my fingertip...

LABEL: 0x9F7
STRING: I touched it again. First with my fingertips, then with the palm of my hand.

LABEL: 0xA3F
STRING: ...Yep.

LABEL: 0xA57
STRING: It was not particularly hot or cold.

LABEL: 0xA81
STRING: This was just a normal metal pipe.

LABEL: 0xB1C
STRING: 「...Sorry, I guess.」

LABEL: 0xB51
STRING: 「You should be, you fool.」

LABEL: 0xB96
STRING: She didn't have to say it like that...

LABEL: 0xBDD
STRING: 「You never know what could happen when you have high-heat pipes exposed in a place like this.」

LABEL: 0xC37
STRING: 「Not to mention, the <SHEEP III> was designed to carry a large number of people from the start.」

LABEL: 0xC8C
STRING: 「It makes sense to assume that the insulation would be thorough.」

LABEL: 0xCC5
STRING: Her logical words were met with nothing but silence.

LABEL: 0xD26
STRING: 「Hm?」

LABEL: 0xD41
STRING: Thick metal plates drew her attention.

LABEL: 0xD77
STRING: Reiri gave a small nod after running her hand over them.

LABEL: 0xE2D
STRING: 「These are... I see.」

LABEL: 0xE58
STRING: 「Did you figure something out?」

LABEL: 0xE8D
STRING: 「No... It doesn't matter right now.」

LABEL: 0xEC2
STRING: 「Right――」

LABEL: 0xEDE
STRING: As usual, she had no intention of telling me anything more.

LABEL: 0xF16
STRING: And I didn't pursue the matter.

LABEL: 0xF3E
STRING: 「Then... what should we do next?」

LABEL: 0xFE6
STRING: 「Before that...」

LABEL: 0x1004
STRING: 「Why don't you let go?」

LABEL: 0x1035
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x104B
STRING: For the umpteenth time, Reiri glared at me harshly.

LABEL: 0x1083
STRING: Let's go?

LABEL: 0x1097
STRING: Go where?

LABEL: 0x10AB
STRING: Did she still think I wanted to hide something?

LABEL: 0x10E7
STRING: Don't tell me she'd been waiting all this time for us to be alone...?

LABEL: 0x11B5
STRING: 「What are you spacing out for?」

LABEL: 0x11E6
STRING: 「Well... Even if you say that...」

LABEL: 0x1227
STRING: 「Ah, geez!」

LABEL: 0x1245
STRING: 「Why is everyone on this ship so clingy?!」

LABEL: 0x1284
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x1306
STRING: 「Let go of me, you idiot!」

LABEL: 0x1345
STRING: Reiri swung her arm around.

LABEL: 0x1375
STRING: My hand, which was still gripping her wrist, was shaken off.

LABEL: 0x13B1
STRING: Oh... That's what she meant...

LABEL: 0x1434
STRING: 「Sorry, I misunderstood.」

LABEL: 0x14C4
STRING: 「Don't go around touching high school girls just because the laws of the surface don't apply here.」

LABEL: 0x1527
STRING: I stared at Reiri.

LABEL: 0x1559
STRING: Her arms were bony.

LABEL: 0x1573
STRING: Unbalanced body.

LABEL: 0x1591
STRING: Minimally groomed hair.

LABEL: 0x15C1
STRING: Her shirt was far from fashionable.

LABEL: 0x15F3
STRING: The highlight was her eyes, which were like a snake targeting its prey.

LABEL: 0x1629
STRING: Her face wasn't bad either, but it wasn't enough to make up for all the negative points.

LABEL: 0x1681
STRING: ...If I was going to lay a hand on a high school girl, I'd pick a better target.

LABEL: 0x16D6
STRING: 「I know what you're thinking.」

LABEL: 0x170A
STRING: 「Still, aren't you being a bit rude?」

LABEL: 0x173B
STRING: I kept my mouth shut.

LABEL: 0x17B6
STRING: Reiri seemed astonished for a moment but quickly returned to normal.

LABEL: 0x186E
STRING: 「Don't worry about me.」

LABEL: 0x1890
STRING: 「Worry about Touri instead.」

LABEL: 0x18BD
STRING: 「Touri...」

LABEL: 0x18E6
STRING: 「Who knows what would happen if you tried something with her...」

LABEL: 0x1991
STRING: 「Do you get what I'm saying?」

LABEL: 0x19B8
STRING: Her unwarranted insinuation baffled me, but I was unable to deny it.

LABEL: 0x19F2
STRING: Certainly, Touri was a healthy, cheerful, and bright girl.

LABEL: 0x1A26
STRING: Charming, you might say.

LABEL: 0x1A67
STRING: 「――I'm not joking.」

LABEL: 0x1AEE
STRING: 「I'm being serious.」

LABEL: 0x1B37
STRING: Her face, with her usual sneering smile, was serious.

LABEL: 0x1B81
STRING: It didn't look like she was joking around at all.

LABEL: 0x1BD4
STRING: 「Whatever one's normal personality is like, in a life or death situation like this...」

LABEL: 0x1C1E
STRING: 「...One's inner desires can rear their ugly head.」

LABEL: 0x1C5A
STRING: 「It's not just you, Katagiri. It's the same for the doctor, the attendant, and everyone else.」

LABEL: 0x1CA6
STRING: 「Whoever it is, it doesn't matter. If you try to hurt Touri...」

LABEL: 0x1D43
STRING: 「I won't hesitate.」

LABEL: 0x1D8A
STRING: She was being excessively threatening in order to protect her sister.

LABEL: 0x1DBA
STRING: Her determination was similar to Touri's back when she had lost sight of her sister.

LABEL: 0x1DF8
STRING: Should I call their desire to protect each other beautiful sisterly love?

LABEL: 0x1EB4
STRING: 「Let's leave it at that.」

LABEL: 0x1EFF
STRING: With that, Reiri held out her hand to me.

LABEL: 0x1FA3
STRING: 「Sorry for saying weird things. I apologize.」

LABEL: 0x1FD9
STRING: 「I still have a lot of faith in you.」

LABEL: 0x2011
STRING: 「Don't go wasting it.」

LABEL: 0x204E
STRING: I firmly grasped her hand.

LABEL: 0x207E
STRING: ...Just like when I had taken her hand instead of Tokiwa's.

LABEL: 0x20C2
STRING: I renewed my resolve. Now that I'd made my choice, I couldn't throw it away so easily.

LABEL: 0x210E
STRING: 「...I get what you're saying.」

LABEL: 0x213A
STRING: 「I don't want to do anything stupid, and I want to return to the surface with everyone.」

LABEL: 0x218A
STRING: 「In the unlikely event that I get in the way of that, do what you want with me.」

LABEL: 0x21D9
STRING: 「Sure.」

LABEL: 0x220E
STRING: With that, we took a step into the forest of pipes.

LABEL: 0x2535
STRING: We made our way deeper and deeper into the steam room, weaving through gaps in the pipes.

LABEL: 0x257F
STRING: Even though the space was not usually intended for people to move through, there was still enough space left to allow for inspections to take place.

LABEL: 0x25EF
STRING: I was starting to get worried about how long the battery of my watch would last if we kept going like this...

LABEL: 0x2652
STRING: 「Do you know where you're going?」

LABEL: 0x268B
STRING: 「If I'm not mistaken, there should be a room in the back.」

LABEL: 0x26BF
STRING: I thought back to the structural map of the <SHEEP III> I had studied before boarding.

LABEL: 0x26FA
STRING: If I remembered correctly, up ahead was...

LABEL: 0x272F
STRING: 「The power room?」

LABEL: 0x2750
STRING: 「That's right.」

LABEL: 0x276E
STRING: 「If things go well, we might be able to restore power to the ship, don't you think?」

LABEL: 0x27AE
STRING: 「Anyway, let's head there for――」

LABEL: 0x27EB
STRING: 「Are you an idiot?」

LABEL: 0x2808
STRING: My plan was rejected by Reiri before I had time to finish.

LABEL: 0x2861
STRING: 「Do you think you can restore the power with no tools?」

LABEL: 0x288F
STRING: 「Are you planning on getting electrocuted by touching a leaking battery?」

LABEL: 0x28D1
STRING: 「That's not just reckless―it's suicide.」

LABEL: 0x296E
STRING: She didn't hold back on her words.

LABEL: 0x298C
STRING: Reiri turned around and started walking back the way we had come from.

LABEL: 0x29D0
STRING: 「Hey, Reiri――」

LABEL: 0x29FF
STRING: 「We can't even get to the power room from here.」

LABEL: 0x2A31
STRING: 「The rooms are next to each other, yes, but there's no door between them.」

LABEL: 0x2A84
STRING: 「No way...」

LABEL: 0x2AAF
STRING: 「I think they were worried that if one area was damaged, it could affect the other.」

LABEL: 0x2B0F
STRING: 「Both heat and power are indispensable down here at the bottom of the cold and dark sea.」

LABEL: 0x2B74
STRING: I chased after Reiri, who was making her way out of the labyrinth of pipes.

LABEL: 0x2C33
STRING: 「Then, how are we going to get out of here?」

LABEL: 0x2C82
STRING: 「There's no exit.」

LABEL: 0x2CA7
STRING: 「What?」

LABEL: 0x2CD4
STRING: 「I've memorized the layout of this ship.」

LABEL: 0x2D06
STRING: 「The only way in and out of the steam room is through the door we came through earlier.」

LABEL: 0x2D60
STRING: 「There's no other way out.」

LABEL: 0x2D89
STRING: She sounded certain... Then, what were we supposed to do?

LABEL: 0x2DCD
STRING: 「We can't stop thinking just because of that.」

LABEL: 0x2DF9
STRING: 「There has to be some way to get out of here.」

LABEL: 0x2E40
STRING: 「Oh?」

LABEL: 0x2E5B
STRING: Reiri showed a vulgar smile at my words.

LABEL: 0x2EB6
STRING: 「Then what?」

LABEL: 0x2ED2
STRING: 「Do you see a point in continuing to think about this, Katagiri-kun?」

LABEL: 0x2F1C
STRING: 「If I told you that the answer to one plus one was three, would you rack your brains trying to figure out how that's possible?」

LABEL: 0x2F88
STRING: 「That's... still better than doing nothing, isn't it?」

LABEL: 0x2FCE
STRING: Reiri suddenly turned her face away.

LABEL: 0x3005
STRING: 「You'd make a good salesman.」

LABEL: 0x309A
STRING: She finally exited the pipe maze and ascended the stairs.

LABEL: 0x3146
STRING: 「Do you remember when we talked about the experiment with rats and levers?」

LABEL: 0x3193
STRING: 「The one about how humans aren't always a match for rats, right?」

LABEL: 0x31DD
STRING: Being smart and thinking strategically was not always optimal.

LABEL: 0x3221
STRING: The best tactic for the experiment was to just keep pulling the lever.

LABEL: 0x3282
STRING: 「There's one more lesson to be learned from that story.」

LABEL: 0x32D0
STRING: 「――Sometimes, the best strategy is to not think at all.」

LABEL: 0x3317
STRING: With that, Reiri opened the door.

LABEL: 0x3413
STRING: 「You idiot...!」

LABEL: 0x3431
STRING: If she did that, <COOS> would get in.

LABEL: 0x3467
STRING: We managed to escape last time, but――

LABEL: 0x3493
STRING: ...Wait.

LABEL: 0x3512
STRING: 「...Nothing's there?」

LABEL: 0x3536
STRING: I had braced myself for no reason, as there was no eerie light to be seen when I peeked into the hallway.

LABEL: 0x3596
STRING: Where did <COOS> go...?

LABEL: 0x35BA
STRING: A voice rose from the small back in front of me.

LABEL: 0x3646
STRING: 「Staying in the same place after losing your target...」

LABEL: 0x36EF
STRING: 「――Is irrational.」

LABEL: 0x39D1
STRING: 「I'm so glad you're both safe!」

LABEL: 0x3A1A
STRING: 「What took you so long, Reiri?!」

LABEL: 0x3ADF
STRING: Three people were waiting for us in the crew room.

LABEL: 0x3B0C
STRING: As soon as we got back, Yukari and Touri greeted us loudly.

LABEL: 0x3B42
STRING: I thought Yukari would get mad at us, but――

LABEL: 0x3B82
STRING: 「Sorry for making you worry, Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x3C1E
STRING: 「No, that's――」

LABEL: 0x3C45
STRING: She was acting somewhat evasive.

LABEL: 0x3C69
STRING: Was there a reason for her slightly embarrassed and apologetic look?

LABEL: 0x3D7E
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x3D96
STRING: 「Momoi's reflecting on her actions.」

LABEL: 0x3DBE
STRING: 「She's ashamed of her thoughtlessness in walking around defenselessly,

LABEL: 0x3DF0
STRING: while knowing full well the how dangerous <COOS> was.」

LABEL: 0x3E3B
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x3EBD
STRING: 「Yes. If I hadn't been with you,

LABEL: 0x3EE9
STRING: we wouldn't have been in such danger even if we ran into <COOS>...」

LABEL: 0x3F52
STRING: 「So she says.」

LABEL: 0x3FCB
STRING: 「...Well, I have to reflect on my own actions, too.」

LABEL: 0x4012
STRING: Having said that, he bit down on a xylitol tablet.

LABEL: 0x4054
STRING: He still looked pale. Was he all right?

LABEL: 0x40D9
STRING: 「Reiri!」

LABEL: 0x40F6
STRING: Touri rushed over to her sister while pouting.

LABEL: 0x420B
STRING: 「I was really worried.」

LABEL: 0x4244
STRING: 「Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x4269
STRING: 「Are you okay? Weren't you attacked by that light monster?」

LABEL: 0x42C0
STRING: 「Sorry.」

LABEL: 0x42DF
STRING: Reiri brushed her off with few words.

LABEL: 0x4354
STRING: 「Ahem.」

LABEL: 0x4371
STRING: Yukari cleared her throat.

LABEL: 0x446A
STRING: 「...So, how did it go?」

LABEL: 0x44AD
STRING: 「Right.」

LABEL: 0x44C3
STRING: 「We ran into the light on the way, but everyone's alright in the end.」

LABEL: 0x44F7
STRING: 「Our goal was achieved.」

LABEL: 0x4583
STRING: 「――The steam room.」

LABEL: 0x45A3
STRING: 「The flowing water makes its way to the steam room, thanks to the tilting of the ship.」

LABEL: 0x45FA
STRING: 「By flushing the PDAs using the plastic bottles,

LABEL: 0x4635
STRING: we can lure <COOS> in there.」

LABEL: 0x4672
STRING: It had been quite the adventure just to confirm that much.

LABEL: 0x46A0
STRING: However, Reiri was smiling in satisfaction.

LABEL: 0x46CC
STRING: She had reached an answer―

LABEL: 0x46FE
STRING: she smiled as if she was welcoming that fact.

LABEL: 0x47AA
STRING: 「And?」

LABEL: 0x47C4
STRING: 「What's the plan after we lure <COOS> there?」

LABEL: 0x487A
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x4892
STRING: 「You can lock them up, dispose of them, or do whatever you please.」

LABEL: 0x4948
STRING: 「Isn't that the most important part of the plan?!」

LABEL: 0x497B
STRING: Yukari pressed Reiri.

LABEL: 0x4997
STRING: However, Reiri kept quiet, seemingly disinterested or perhaps amused.

LABEL: 0x49ED
STRING: The point of gathering all of <COOS> into one place was to destroy them.

LABEL: 0x4A3D
STRING: All that was left was to find a way to finish them off――

LABEL: 0x4AF7
STRING: ...The last step.

LABEL: 0x4B15
STRING: We knew we were one step away from the goal but didn't know how to take that step.

LABEL: 0x4B65
STRING: That frustration turned into impatience, which in turn prevented us from finding an answer.

LABEL: 0x4BBF
STRING: A sudden silence fell in the room.

LABEL: 0x4BDF
STRING: What should we do? The answer was right in front of us...

LABEL: 0x4C2A
STRING: 「By the way, are there any cockroaches on this ship?」

LABEL: 0x4CC7
STRING: Touri's outlandish question resounded in the quiet crew room.

LABEL: 0x4D56
STRING: All eyes were now on her.

LABEL: 0x4D8A
STRING: It was an outlandish question, but I could see the punch line coming.

LABEL: 0x4DDB
STRING: 「If there are, then there should be some kind of insecticide here as well, right?」

LABEL: 0x4E88
STRING: 「I just thought, what if we used that on them...」

LABEL: 0x4EE3
STRING: 「Unfortunately, I don't think that would work.」

LABEL: 0x4F18
STRING: Yukari rejected her suggestion, choosing her words carefully.

LABEL: 0x501F
STRING: 「How should I put this...」

LABEL: 0x50B6
STRING: 「First, let me tell you something important.」

LABEL: 0x50EA
STRING: 「Killing the host does not get rid of <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x5134
STRING: 「In our case, killing the crustaceans won't solve the fundamental problem.」

LABEL: 0x5197
STRING: 「So, what are you trying to say?」

LABEL: 0x51C1
STRING: Wouldn't <COOS> perish as well if left without a host organism?

LABEL: 0x523D
STRING: Yukari shook her head coldly, however.

LABEL: 0x5280
STRING: 「Even if the host dies, its corpse remains as organic matter.」

LABEL: 0x532B
STRING: 「That's all <COOS> needs.」

LABEL: 0x538F
STRING: 「Killing their host and leaving a corpse lying around isn't a good idea...」

LABEL: 0x53F1
STRING: 「――There was an estate in the past where people had left the plants and animals infected with <COOS> to die.」

LABEL: 0x5461
STRING: 「Needless to say, it was soon destroyed.」

LABEL: 0x54A5
STRING: 「The land and its surrounding area were no longer inhabitable at that point.」

LABEL: 0x5563
STRING: 「D-Did something like that really happen...?」

LABEL: 0x559C
STRING: Touri interrupted Yukari's story.

LABEL: 0x55C2
STRING: To think that the land had become uninhabitable just because they had left the dead plants and animals behind...

LABEL: 0x561E
STRING: It sounded like an urban legend if you thought about it.

LABEL: 0x565E
STRING: If I wasn't in this situation and hadn't seen that bewitching light of <COOS>...

LABEL: 0x56B6
STRING: ...I wouldn't have believed her either.

LABEL: 0x5754
STRING: 「I know it's hard to believe.」

LABEL: 0x57E3
STRING: 「But it's true... The old Gardner estate is still heavily guarded to this day.」

LABEL: 0x5844
STRING: It didn't seem to me like she was lying.

LABEL: 0x5894
STRING: Even Reiri was listening to her without butting in.

LABEL: 0x5926
STRING: ――Then, what should we do?

LABEL: 0x5954
STRING: As long as the corpses remained, <COOS> would not die.

LABEL: 0x598C
STRING: In order to exterminate <COOS>, we would have to eradicate the infected organisms' whole existence from the ship.

LABEL: 0x59EC
STRING: But how could we do that...?

LABEL: 0x5A17
STRING: 「Katagiri has an idea.」

LABEL: 0x5A40
STRING: Reiri abruptly whispered something.

LABEL: 0x5A6C
STRING: Her raspy voice echoed symbolically in the hopeless silence.

LABEL: 0x5B87
STRING: 「...You have a plan?」

LABEL: 0x5BC4
STRING: 「Yeah. But you won't hear it from me.」

LABEL: 0x5C52
STRING: Saying that, she glanced at me sharply. There wasn't a hint of amusement on her face.

LABEL: 0x5C9E
STRING: 「What do you...?」

LABEL: 0x5D2A
STRING: 「It's the same as always.」

LABEL: 0x5D4C
STRING: 「I'm not the one to give you an answer.」

LABEL: 0x5D78
STRING: 「I've already finished what I can do. Now it's your turn.」

LABEL: 0x5DF5
STRING: She then looked away and fell silent.

LABEL: 0x5E2F
STRING: She was the only one who remained quiet, however.

LABEL: 0x5F17
STRING: I was left at the center of attention in this tense atmosphere.

LABEL: 0x5F61
STRING: Naturally, I didn't have any ideas.

LABEL: 0x5F97
STRING: Reiri's words might just have been an attempt to pass the buck.

LABEL: 0x5FE7
STRING: I had no ideas, but――

LABEL: 0x6041
STRING: 「――Just... give me a minute.」

LABEL: 0x606F
STRING: Just wait.

LABEL: 0x6089
STRING: I had no answer right now, nor any ideas which to pursue.

LABEL: 0x60D3
STRING: But, would Reiri say something like that without a reason?

LABEL: 0x611D
STRING: She might not always be right, but she didn't talk without thinking.

LABEL: 0x6179
STRING: There had to be something.

LABEL: 0x6199
STRING: Something.

LABEL: 0x61AF
STRING: Me and Reiri...

LABEL: 0x61CB
STRING: I thought back to the last few hours we had spent together.

LABEL: 0x62CE
STRING: What were we doing?

LABEL: 0x62F2
STRING: What did we see?

LABEL: 0x6391
STRING: What the hell was Reiri thinking――

LABEL: 0x647A
STRING: The steam room.」

LABEL: 0x64F2
STRING: A flash of inspiration came to me out of nowhere.

LABEL: 0x65D0
STRING: 「The bottom level of the tilted <SHEEP III>...」

LABEL: 0x6607
STRING: 「We'll lure <COOS> into the steam room using the rafts and the flow of water.」

LABEL: 0x665F
STRING: 「We'll corner them there.」

LABEL: 0x66FD
STRING: 「And? What are we going to do after we corner them?」

LABEL: 0x67A0
STRING: 「What would happen if we did something in a delicate place like that――」

LABEL: 0x687C
STRING: 「Isn't that enough already?」

LABEL: 0x6912
STRING: 「What?」

LABEL: 0x692D
STRING: Hiragino seemed to have figured out my plan.

LABEL: 0x695D
STRING: 「Once we get them inside the steam room, we'll destroy the pipes.」

LABEL: 0x699B
STRING: 「You know what happens when hot steam leaks from a pipe?」

LABEL: 0x69F4
STRING: 「...You'll get cooked?」

LABEL: 0x6A21
STRING: I nodded in response to Touri's reserved tone.

LABEL: 0x6A87
STRING: If they were trapped in a small steam room like that...

LABEL: 0x6AC5
STRING: We could fill it with the steam used to heat the ship.

LABEL: 0x6B09
STRING: Anything trapped inside would get steamed to death.

LABEL: 0x6B55
STRING: 「With enough heat, protein will begin to denature.」

LABEL: 0x6B8F
STRING: 「Even <COOS> wouldn't be able to survive that.」

LABEL: 0x6BF6
STRING: 「Absolutely not!」

LABEL: 0x6C1B
STRING: And sure enough, it was Yukari who raised her voice in protest.

LABEL: 0x6C49
STRING: It wasn't only because she was against the idea, but she was also shocked about something else.

LABEL: 0x6D05
STRING: 「Destroying the steam room... Destroying the heating system...」

LABEL: 0x6D41
STRING: 「Do you have any idea what that means?」

LABEL: 0x6DA6
STRING: She let out an exasperated sigh after I was struck speechless.

LABEL: 0x6E62
STRING: 「――It's suicide.」

LABEL: 0x6E84
STRING: 「It's impossible to live without heat at the bottom of the sea.」

LABEL: 0x6EDF
STRING: 「That again...」

LABEL: 0x6F73
STRING: 「This is different from the talk about recklessness from earlier.」

LABEL: 0x6FBC
STRING: She continued to speak without flinching.

LABEL: 0x6FE6
STRING: Reiri frowned in displeasure.

LABEL: 0x70E3
STRING: 「...You're concerned about the temperature on the ship dropping, right?」

LABEL: 0x712E
STRING: 「That's right. If you understand, why don't you tell us?」

LABEL: 0x717F
STRING: 「Tell you what?」

LABEL: 0x71A6
STRING: 「You know the temperature of the deep sea, right?」

LABEL: 0x71D8
STRING: 「Three degrees Celsius. It's not a temperature people can live in.」

LABEL: 0x7289
STRING: 「Then, do you know what the temperature is out in space?」

LABEL: 0x731A
STRING: 「Three Kelvin. The deep sea is warm enough.」

LABEL: 0x73B7
STRING: 「――What does that have to do with anything?!」

LABEL: 0x73E4
STRING: Of course, the bottom of the sea would be warmer compared to the vacuum of space.

LABEL: 0x742C
STRING: Yukari was not fooled by a rhetoric like that.

LABEL: 0x7468
STRING: However, there was an opening now.

LABEL: 0x748C
STRING: A way in that Reiri's words had created――

LABEL: 0x7524
STRING: 「Let me tell you something else.」

LABEL: 0x7558
STRING: 「The heating is powered by batteries, right?」

LABEL: 0x75D4
STRING: 「We have a leak, unfortunately.」

LABEL: 0x75FC
STRING: 「The heating won't last long no matter what we do.」

LABEL: 0x76BD
STRING: Yukari's eyes opened wide.

LABEL: 0x76D9
STRING: Reiri's sharp glare shot through her.

LABEL: 0x7781
STRING: 「If you don't believe me, you're welcome to confirm it with your own eyes.」

LABEL: 0x77C5
STRING: 「What's wrong with us using a dying battery or two to live anyway?」

LABEL: 0x7832
STRING: 「W-Wait a minute...」

LABEL: 0x785D
STRING: The confused-looking Yukari spoke with a pale face.

LABEL: 0x7923
STRING: 「If that's true, why didn't you say anything until now...?」

LABEL: 0x79D3
STRING: 「Can we do something about it?」

LABEL: 0x7A87
STRING: 「I'm the chief attendant!」

LABEL: 0x7AB9
STRING: 「It doesn't matter if we can do something or not! I'm in charge of this ship!」

LABEL: 0x7B6B
STRING: 「You're out of your depth.」

LABEL: 0x7C12
STRING: Yukari's face turned red.

LABEL: 0x7C32
STRING: She was angry at Reiri's immorality and at her own powerlessness.

LABEL: 0x7CAA
STRING: Hiragino grabbed her shaking shoulders.

LABEL: 0x7DAF
STRING: 「Momoi, calm down!」

LABEL: 0x7E9E
STRING: 「You keep quiet, Hiragino-sensei! This is my problem!」

LABEL: 0x7F4C
STRING: 「It's our problem.」

LABEL: 0x7F6A
STRING: 「This whole ship's... right?」

LABEL: 0x7FEC
STRING: He firmly grasped Yukari's shoulders and admonished her.

LABEL: 0x804E
STRING: He then turned to Reiri.

LABEL: 0x8070
STRING: She stuck out her chin in amusement and looked down at Hiragino despite their height difference.

LABEL: 0x80B8
STRING: The two glared at each other with defiant eyes.

LABEL: 0x80E3
STRING: But, Hiragino quickly looked away.

LABEL: 0x817D
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x819A
STRING: 「Y-Yeah?」

LABEL: 0x81C3
STRING: 「I know we don't have much time, but let's think about this calmly for now.」

LABEL: 0x8207
STRING: 「You too, Touri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x8236
STRING: 「Sure.」

LABEL: 0x825B
STRING: 「...And Yukari.」

LABEL: 0x830C
STRING: 「Listen, whether <COOS> is there or not is irrelevant to us getting out of here.」

LABEL: 0x837C
STRING: 「As long as we keep away and are safe, there's no problem...」

LABEL: 0x83CE
STRING: 「Is the assumption that we need to kill it really true?」

LABEL: 0x8437
STRING: As long as we kept away from <COOS>, we didn't need to kill it...?

LABEL: 0x8475
STRING: I had been getting ahead of myself thanks to the disaster that fiendishly-colored light had wrought. What Hiragino was saying made sense.

LABEL: 0x85A8
STRING: 「B-But if <COOS> is out there, we can't move around freely, right?」

LABEL: 0x85FD
STRING: 「Yes, it would be an obstacle to our escape.」

LABEL: 0x863C
STRING: 「In that case, it's fine as long as we can isolate it.」

LABEL: 0x867A
STRING: If we could keep it in one place, there would be no need to destroy the heating system.

LABEL: 0x8732
STRING: 「Then, if we neutralize <COOS> by isolating it, we can escape?」

LABEL: 0x8793
STRING: 「Is that so...?」

LABEL: 0x88EA
STRING: 「――No, wait a minute.」

LABEL: 0x8950
STRING: Was the threat <COOS> possessed merely a direct attack by them?

LABEL: 0x8996
STRING: No... There had to be something more――

LABEL: 0x8AAE
STRING: 「...As long as <COOS> is here, rescue won't come.」

LABEL: 0x8AEE
STRING: 「<COOS> is the reason we've been abandoned.」

LABEL: 0x8B9A
STRING: 「...What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x8BEE
STRING: The reason rescue wasn't coming was because of <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x8C2A
STRING: My assumption might seem abrupt, but was it not reasonable?

LABEL: 0x8C74
STRING: The more I thought about it, the more sense it made.

LABEL: 0x8CA8
STRING: 「Why hasn't the rescue team shown themselves?」

LABEL: 0x8CEE
STRING: 「Why didn't they meet up with us, even though they boarded the ship?」

LABEL: 0x8DD0
STRING: 「Yukari-san... Earlier,

LABEL: 0x8DFC
STRING: you told us to "abandon the infected."」

LABEL: 0x8E34
STRING: 「That's ROMLES' policy, isn't it?」

LABEL: 0x8EA6
STRING: Yukari cautiously confirmed my suspicions.

LABEL: 0x8ECE
STRING: Hiragino looked at me with concern.

LABEL: 0x8F66
STRING: 「Just what――」

LABEL: 0x8F8F
STRING: 「The people from ROMLES, or at least whoever came to "rescue" us,

LABEL: 0x8FEB
STRING: knew about the threat of <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x904F
STRING: 「And according to ROMLES, "the infected should be abandoned."」

LABEL: 0x9099
STRING: When in doubt, punish.

LABEL: 0x918A
STRING: 「What does all that mean...?」

LABEL: 0x91CD
STRING: 「The rescue party ran into them first.」

LABEL: 0x920D
STRING: 「The creatures infected with <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x9237
STRING: The light spreading through the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x9260
STRING: Seeing it, wouldn't the rescue team be convinced that we had come into contact with it inside this confined ship?

LABEL: 0x92D2
STRING: 「And that's the reason they haven't rescued us. Because there's a chance we've made contact with <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x933F
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x9362
STRING: 「That's also why they put us to sleep.」

LABEL: 0x93B2
STRING: 「――They didn't want us moving around carelessly.」

LABEL: 0x945E
STRING: 「...Does that mean they abandoned us without even making sure?」

LABEL: 0x94A6
STRING: 「That's... terrible...」

LABEL: 0x94E5
STRING: 「That's not true.」

LABEL: 0x9542
STRING: Yukari interrupted Touri's hopeless voice.

LABEL: 0x95D8
STRING: 「Any person who may have come in contact with <COOS> is considered infected――」

LABEL: 0x9626
STRING: 「It's more than a directive from ROMLES. It's self-defense.」

LABEL: 0x96D9
STRING: 「Even they have their pride as rescue workers.」

LABEL: 0x9715
STRING: 「They would never abandon those left behind if there was a chance to help them.」

LABEL: 0x97DC
STRING: 「Just... please understand that.」

LABEL: 0x9823
STRING: 「Yeah... Sorry.」

LABEL: 0x984E
STRING: 「I see... That's their logic.」

LABEL: 0x987A
STRING: That was their logic, their ethics.

LABEL: 0x98A6
STRING: It was unreasonable to blame them for that.

LABEL: 0x98D0
STRING: But, they weren't ours.

LABEL: 0x991E
STRING: I wouldn't abandon anyone.

LABEL: 0x9942
STRING: 「All we need to do to save our lives is prove it.」

LABEL: 0x9984
STRING: 「Prove that the threat <COOS> possesses has passed.」

LABEL: 0x99C2
STRING: And to do that――

LABEL: 0x99E0
STRING: 「We have to eradicate <COOS> after all.」
